amendment.description: Amendment sought to remove the $988 million in funding for a 10th DDG-51 Destroyer and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Shipbuilding and Conversion, Navy account by $988,000,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Quigley amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 60 - 359 (Roll no. 474).
